channel.title: Data Science on Sohaib Panwala

item.title: Analytics of Retail Data
item.description: I obtained generated retail data from Keith Galli, the dataset obtained had about 200,000 orders with varying different aspects about them. From this, i performed feature engineering and data cleaning in extracting date, time data and locations to give me further insights on the best revenue generating months/cities. Under certain assumptions, I was able to model the optimal time to advertise. Furthermore, i went and extracted key business insights such as the best selling products and the best complements of products bought (i.
